name: Queenie's Halloween Adventure
description:
Controls: left/right to move    CTRL to jump

A simple platformer about Queenie the mouse who ventures off into the forest to collect pumpkins in time for Halloween. This is a work in progress and my first game ever so please be gentle lol

Made for the 2021 Autumn game jam. Loosely follows the colour palette, and hoping to incorporate a day/night cycle for future levels. Queenie's animation by me. Music, background and pumpkin assets credited below:

Pumpkin: PumpO! by searhere https://searhere.itch.io/pumpo

Background: Hero's Journey - Ancient Wood by Anokolisa https://anokolisa.itch.io/mushroom-grove

Music: Sakura Variation by WuxiaScrub https://wuxia-scrub.itch.io/

Tools:

  • Clickteam Fusion 2.5 - game engine
  • Krita - animated sprite
